Happy to help. To book a flight to London on 20 September 2025, I need a few details:

- Departure city/airport
- One-way or round trip? If round trip, return date
- Preferred London airport(s): Heathrow (LHR), Gatwick (LGW), City (LCY), or any
- Number of travelers (adults/children/infants)
- Cabin class: economy, premium economy, business, first
- Time preference on the 20th (morning/afternoon/evening) and direct flights only?
- Checked baggage needed?
- Airline/alliance preferences (e.g., OneWorld/SkyTeam/Star) or specific carriers
- Budget range and flexibility (+/- 1–2 days okay?)

Once you share these, I’ll propose the best 3–5 flight options and a step-by-step booking plan. Also, please confirm the date format is 20 September 2025.
